entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
